snippet: The Giants re-signed wide receiver Domenik Hixon, who missed most of last season after surgery on a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee.
abstract: New York Giants re-sign wide receiver Domenik Hixon, who missed most of last season after surgery on a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee.
lead_paragraph: The Giants re-signed wide receiver Domenik Hixon, who missed most of last season after surgery on a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee.
